targets.rawSql:
WITH stats AS(
      SELECT 01 AS Position, 'Sample count'         AS Metric, cnt || ''                             AS Value FROM test_step_execution_statistics where test_step_execution_id = '$_TestStepExecutionID'
UNION SELECT 02 AS Position, 'Min req. duration'    AS Metric, min || ' ms'                          AS Value FROM test_step_execution_statistics where test_step_execution_id = '$_TestStepExecutionID'
UNION SELECT 03 AS Position, 'Max req. duration'    AS Metric, max || ' ms'                          AS Value FROM test_step_execution_statistics where test_step_execution_id = '$_TestStepExecutionID'
UNION SELECT 04 AS Position, 'Avg req. duration'    AS Metric, avg || ' ms'                          AS Value FROM test_step_execution_statistics where test_step_execution_id = '$_TestStepExecutionID'
UNION SELECT 05 AS Position, 'Errors'               AS Metric, failure || ' (' || round(failure_ratio * 100, 0) || '%)' AS Value FROM test_step_execution_statistics where test_step_execution_id = '$_TestStepExecutionID'
UNION SELECT 07 AS Position, '75th percentile'      AS Metric, round(percentile75, 0) || ' ms'       AS Value FROM test_step_execution_statistics where test_step_execution_id = '$_TestStepExecutionID'
UNION SELECT 08 AS Position, '90th percentile'      AS Metric, round(percentile90, 0) || ' ms'       AS Value FROM test_step_execution_statistics where test_step_execution_id = '$_TestStepExecutionID'
UNION SELECT 09 AS Position, '95th percentile'      AS Metric, round(percentile95, 0) || ' ms'       AS Value FROM test_step_execution_statistics where test_step_execution_id = '$_TestStepExecutionID'
UNION SELECT 10 AS Position, '98th percentile'      AS Metric, round(percentile98, 0) || ' ms'       AS Value FROM test_step_execution_statistics where test_step_execution_id = '$_TestStepExecutionID'
UNION SELECT 11 AS Position, 'Median req. duration' AS Metric, round(median, 0) || ' ms'             AS Value FROM test_step_execution_statistics where test_step_execution_id = '$_TestStepExecutionID'
UNION SELECT 12 AS Position, 'Last req. duration'   AS Metric, last || ' ms'                         AS Value FROM test_step_execution_statistics where test_step_execution_id = '$_TestStepExecutionID'
UNION SELECT 13 AS Position, 'Trans. per second'    AS Metric, tps || ''                          AS Value FROM test_step_execution_statistics where test_step_execution_id = '$_TestStepExecutionID')
SELECT Metric, Value FROM stats ORDER BY Position;

select date_time AS "time",
       tps       AS "Rate, req/s",
       err       AS "Errors, req/s",
       last_ms   AS "Duration, ms"
from get_test_step_execution_metrics(
                    '$_TestStepExecutionID',
                    '${StartTime}');

list.definition:
select name
from performance_test
where id in (select performance_test_id
             from performance_test_execution
             where test_environment_id = $_TestEnvironmentID);
list.label: Performance Test
list.name: PerformanceTest
list.query:
select name
from performance_test
where id in (select performance_test_id
             from performance_test_execution
             where test_environment_id = $_TestEnvironmentID);

list.definition:
select to_char(start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
from performance_test_execution
where test_environment_id = '${_TestEnvironmentID}'
  and performance_test_id = '${_PerformanceTestID}';
list.label: Start Time
list.name: StartTime
list.query:
select to_char(start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
from performance_test_execution
where test_environment_id = '${_TestEnvironmentID}'
  and performance_test_id = '${_PerformanceTestID}';

list.name: _PerformanceTestID
_TestEnvironmentID

list.definition:
select name
from test_step ts
         join test_step_execution tse on ts.id = tse.test_step_id
where tse.test_case_execution_id in
      (select id
       from test_case_execution
       where scenario_execution_id in
             (select id
              from scenario_execution
              where performance_test_execution_id = $_PerformanceTestExecutionID)
    );
list.label: Request
list.name: TestStep
list.query:
select name
from test_step ts
         join test_step_execution tse on ts.id = tse.test_step_id
where tse.test_case_execution_id in
      (select id
       from test_case_execution
       where scenario_execution_id in
             (select id
              from scenario_execution
              where performance_test_execution_id = $_PerformanceTestExecutionID)
    );

list.definition:
select id
from performance_test_execution
where performance_test_id = '$_PerformanceTestID'
  and start_time = '$StartTime'
  and test_environment_id = '$_TestEnvironmentID';
list.name: _PerformanceTestExecutionID
list.query:
select id
from performance_test_execution
where performance_test_id = '$_PerformanceTestID'
  and start_time = '$StartTime'
  and test_environment_id = '$_TestEnvironmentID';

list.name: _TestStepID

list.definition:
select tse.id
from test_step_execution tse
         join test_step ts on ts.id = tse.test_step_id
         join test_case_execution tce on tse.test_case_execution_id = tce.id
         join test_case tc on tc.id = tce.test_case_id
         join scenario_execution se on se.id = tce.scenario_execution_id
         join scenario s on s.id = se.scenario_id
         join performance_test_execution pte on pte.id = se.performance_test_execution_id
         join performance_test pt on pt.id = pte.performance_test_id
where ts.id = '$_TestStepID'
and pte.id = '$_PerformanceTestExecutionID';
list.name: _TestStepExecutionID
list.query:
select tse.id
from test_step_execution tse
         join test_step ts on ts.id = tse.test_step_id
         join test_case_execution tce on tse.test_case_execution_id = tce.id
         join test_case tc on tc.id = tce.test_case_id
         join scenario_execution se on se.id = tce.scenario_execution_id
         join scenario s on s.id = se.scenario_id
         join performance_test_execution pte on pte.id = se.performance_test_execution_id
         join performance_test pt on pt.id = pte.performance_test_id
where ts.id = '$_TestStepID'
and pte.id = '$_PerformanceTestExecutionID';
